casebody.data:
Steven and Deborah BRADY, Next of Kin of Eric A. Brady, Deceased Employee, Plaintiff-Appellees,
v.
BEST BUY CO., INC., Employer, New Hampshire Ins. Co., Carrier (Gallagher Bassett Services, Inc., Third-Party Administrator), Defendant-Appellants. No. COA17-315 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: October 3, 2017

AFFIRMED.
